title: Sins of the Martyrs? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: dia says if a person is martyred in the cause of Allah but he had sins like backbiting fornication etc would it be erased insha'Allah it would be reached the reward of martyrdom nothing stands in its way except that the Prophet said re salat WA Salam all the sins of a martyr is erased except for the deaths this is what gibreel told him so lala haria seldom
